description:
1.- Exclusive - ”Reply with AI” option (Tap any message that contains text)
2.- You can now enable Blur on the header within a conversation, but there is more compatibility with Android 15 and later (MB Preferences -> Chat Screen -> Enable Blur)
3.- New option to change the size of the Stickers (When sending only one)
4.- Fixed a bug where Meta AI or other Meta bots were showing too many ”Edited Message” options
6.- Some others fixeds
